reviewText: This dress is great. From reading other reviews I was slightly hesitant but made the purchase anyhow. I'm glad I did. The dress shipped promptly and it fit wonderfully. I'm 5'8 and the dress came just at my knee. It does ride up a little when you walk but not too much to where it's uncomfortable or too short. I received a lot of compliments in this dress and felt great in it. It's really versatile as well; I wore it to an interview with a blazer over it as well as just out with a pair of nice black heels. I'm sure you could also pair it with a pair of flats.
Love this dress, fit really good.

For the price, this dress is great! I am 5'5"/125lbs. I ordered a medium, and the fit is perfect. The fabric is nice and does not look cheap. The color is also true to the photo. The only real down side is the dress is not lined. (Minor concern if you take into account the low price tag)

I wear this dress with a pair of orange platform shoes and it looks fantastic! As a matter of fact, the first time I wore this dress was to meet a friend for lunch. Before the end of the afternoon, I had two gentlemen ask me out on dates! (And I am married!)

In a nutshell, if you want a stunning dress that looks great and does your ego a lot of good, BUY IT!

I am 5'10 so finding a dress that will cover my scared knees is important to me. This description said it was 41.7 inches long. It's not. The one I received is only 37.6 inches long. The picture also shows an invisible zipper is used in the back of the dress. The dress I received has a HUGE BRIGHT SILVER zipper running the entire length of the dress down the back. It zips and unzips from both the bottom and the top. It's really weird and I never would have ordered it if it looked like that in the pictures. Very dissatisfied and hope that return doesn't give me a hassle.

This dress is not like the picture shows. It does not fall below the knee, the material is quite thin and too clingy for my taste, and the color looks more like black than blue with orange. Plus, there was no invoice and no return address, other than "China" so I can't return it. Too bad, as I'd like to have a dress like the one in the picture.
Great, flattering dress. Fits well and made of a nice material. I wear a size 8 and the large fit perfectly. Very nice quality.
I love this dress. I bought this dress to wear to work but found it sexy enough to wear for happy hour and even date night. I am a very curvy size 6 so I bought a Medium and its perfect.
This dress is amazing! I love it and it looks great. The length was not quite as long as the picture shows but it is still a nice length,not too short!
Love this dress. I generally wear a medium, ordered this in a medium..It fitted perfectly well. Look and feel of the item was up to par.
Ordered wrong size, but reordering.

I'm starting to love Miusol clothing. My past purchase was lace white half length sleeve with navy chiffon skirt (it's a dress). It was affordable and great quality considering the price. This time I bought orange/navy dress. I'm 5'2 skinny and not curvy, the length goes below my knee just like the picture. This is so classy and it can be worn for work or family events. Zipper in the back annoys me a bit but that goes all the way down so it's easy to wear.

reviewText: I had to guess what size to get between reading the size chart and the reviews, and i guessed medium, but i am going to try to exchange for a small, the medium is just a little too big. i guess it ran large from what i was expecting, because i followed the size chart and got a medium but i think i should have got a small.  my measurements are: 32b-28-36, and i am 5'10" 140 lbs. i usually wear a US 4-6, and i had the impression that Miusol ran one size larger than US sizing, so i thought their medium would run like a US small, it might be more like a US S/M. the lengths on the chart are off, my medium dress is 40" long, not 41.7" inches that the chart denotes, maybe that is a good thing if you don't want that much length, but i do! this hits me just above the knees. also, the zipper is hidden,and i purchased this from Pixie Missy and they got it here quickly.
summary: it's a nice ~$25 dress. you get what you pay for.

reviewText: bought these for my 17 year old, fits like a glove she is a size 6, dresses are very beautiful. moneys worth would buy again

This is the perfect bra. It's supportive, breathable, & very comfortable. I have many sensitive & sore spots from Fibromyalgia & Lupus and this is the only bra that doesn't directly push on those spots & trigger pain. These multi-packs are a really great deal--great product & great price!

I have been wearing this brand for several years and wanted a few more for replacements. It could just be me but my size fit much tighter than I ordered previously. My old bra's may be stretched out a bit but they kept riding up as I have a long torso so, next size up. The colors are brilliant and fresh.

I'm rather large busted (42DD), and I have always worn underwire bras. Never again! Who knew that great support could be had while being comfortable? Not only that, but these bras are much prettier than the typical black, white, nude that you get directly from the manufacturer. They come with pads for added coverage and support. You must try these bras!
These are he only bras I wear.  I had a breast reduction and they fit and feel like your wearing nothing.  Love these bras!!

reviewText:
I have purchased this style in other places, but were too skimpy.
The pads in these "Genie" bras make the bra fit nicely.
These are very comfortable.  I am recovering from lung cancer surgery and these bras are very soft and not irritating.

I just received these today and was a bit leery about the fit. According to the sizes, I am a 40D,  I should have gotten a 2X, but, I ordered 1X by mistake and just figured if they didn't fit I exchange them. I tried one on over a T shirt and it fit perfectly, I am glad I didn't order the larger size. They seem like they will be very comfortable. The pad on the inside isn't as bad as I thought they would be it seems they just give you shape and don't add to the bust size. Great bra.

Great and comfortable for wearing around the house for lounging and modesty.  I do not wear to work because they do not have enough support but love them to put on when I get home for comfort and modesty.

Delivery is timely. Fit as expected, and they last along time and keep their shape. I wear a DD cup and this bra gives me enough support. I order one size smaller for when I'm engaging in very active activities. I have bought this kind for the last two years. They last a long time.  I still wear 2 year old ones that have lost some of the color from excessive washing when I work in the yard etc. they still maintain their shape.

I have several of these bras in beige and black, and I like them very much.  Comfortable and supportive, wash great, and they keep their shape.  When I decided to buy more colors, I was surprised that the sizes ran larger.  And the material is thinner.  I kept them because I can get away with the size, but in the future, I'll stick with the black and beige.
I love these bras - they fit great and never wear out. You'll toss them out of boredom before they wear out. Truly a great price for a great product.

I love these bras and I am so glad they finally come in colors!

I am a large boobed woman, (settle down fellas!) These actually give me great support with out squeezing my rib cage until I can't breath or creating that dreaded uniboob look. The genie bra (unlike the ahh bra) has those nice pads in them to keep things from uh poking out.  It's comfy and supportive, what more could you ask for?

I love, love, love the colors!  They washed beautifully.  They arrived when expected.  The pads seem to be a bit thicker and more firm than the bras I have purchased in stores.  So far, and I just got them, they are not pilling like the ones I already have.  Very comfy.  Just a tad larger than I'm used too.  When I say larger, I mean in the strap area. That's why I didn't give 5 stars. They don't seem as supportive, however, the pads make up for it.  That said, I will absolutely purchase them again.  Price is great, color awesome.  They make me happy!
summary: A little larger than I thought.

reviewText: I really like these bras. I already have some so I know to buy one size up, but these still were a little snug. around the band line.  Also, don't put them in the dryer, but let them air dry on a hanger.  I use them for sport bras at the gym and they're very comfortable.

I purchased a Genie Bra in a physical store and loved it. So, I ordered these in pretty colors. Love the colors, but the product was not the same as the one from the brick-and-mortar store.

The physical store product is made of sturdier material, has nice lace detailing, and has pads that remain in place. Also, the sizing is not consistent. This product is comfortable and pretty, but it is not the same thing as the one I purchases earlier.
summary: Great, but not what I expected

reviewText: Hot pink is my favorite color and it is not in this pack. The lavender looks old and faded. The blue is the only pretty color in the package. Same great Genie Bra fit though! Your breasts will look amazing!
Colors are nice, but the straps are very long.

OK, I tried the ahh bras and loved them but when the cat would jump up on the couch or the bed and walk up me, as cats are want to do, it could be painful on the upper chest, ah hem.....so I decided to try the Genie, because of the pads, and what do you know, no bruises and no discomfort from little kitty feet!!!....probably not the ringing endorsement the Genie people would like but I love them and will be getting more.

I love these bras. They are so comfortable YOU DON't even know you are wearing it. The colors are vibrant ,easy to wash and dry quickly. I hand wash these and hang dry them. You can launder them in your washer and they do fine.love the colors and comfort.
I sleep in them and  am very comfortable .I would like to suggest wider strap on  the shoulder and possibly a front closure for people  like me who have  severe hand arthritis or other issues with their hands. JUST A SUGGESTION FOR A GREAT  BRA..Thanks for a wonderful  addition to my lingerie drawer.

Huge bust? Buy 2 sizes smaller! I am a 38H (<-- not a typo). I should probably be a XXXL in these, but I bought these in just a large. Then I took the pads out, and it's perfect! I mean, I wouldn't jog or jump rope in them, but I can walk my dog, lift weights, or do yoga and they are super comfy!

ehhh....these are not that great, but not horrible either. They could not be used as an every day bra if you are anything more than a b cup. they are soft and comfortable, but provide basically no support. Great to sleep in or wear around the house, but i won't be wearing them out in public. The colors are very nice though, just as pictured.
summary: these are not that great, but not horrible either

reviewText: These bras are very comfortable, they fit just right and my back doesn't show bumps, that other bras make. Yay!

I had picked up a 2-pack of Genie bras at some dept. store.  These three, the material is much nicer feeling-- softer, prettier.  The others are a bit industrial.  The colors are nice.  I like the comfort and the removable pads.  The 'pocket' is actually the whole front.  I slide a tiny pedometer in mine and it's safe and invisible.

Good for days you don't want to wear something traditional and be comfortable.
Hold well and looks good on. Colors perfect for summer
These are really comfortable and supportive bras. I bought them for exercise/working out but now I wear them every day because they are really comfortable.
summary: the same perfect comfortable fit in some cool spring colors

reviewText: Once I discovered the Genie I haven't worn anything else. And I have absolutely no plans of wearing anything else. I don't care if you're 15 or 65, you will want to use this product.  I go all day long and forget that it's on.  And my figure looks terrific. You're not going to feel that way with underwires. Know what I mean?

I was looking for comfortable light support for when I'm just hanging out at home.  I am heavy breasted and wear full underwire support all day so just wanted something light.  They do ride up but I kind of expected they would.  Although I am a small frame I ordered a large size because I couldn't order by cup size.  I'm glad I ordered the large.

I am a 36" bust. With C cups. The cups fit fine but the bust going around seems way too small for ordering a large. it feels too tight. Not so tight im not wearing them but i'd deff get an extra large next time. I'd say if you were a 38" or more id order much much larger to feel comfortable and not like you're wearing a corset! I'm thinking these are made for really really small women.
These particular bras seemed to fit looser than the others I have purchased. They do seem to fit differently depending on the color?

I really like these bras. Pretty colors. More comfortable than sport bras. I usually wear large in everything. All shirts and bras. But these are a little more snug than I like. I definitely should have gone with an extra
Large to be more comfortable. I usually wear a 34 or 36 DD.  Definitely great to wear around the house and to bed. I took those pads out though, didn't like them at all. However they were easily removed.
summary: Love bra but order a size bigger

reviewText: It fits very well but the sizes very just a little. It's much more comfortable than a bra with wires but it does ride up on me a bit.
Great, soft, comfortable, support and nice colors  I also use them to work out in..  I would not use them to run in for support.
I have a non standard size and hardly ever can get anything to fit, but this works well. It is very forgiving, and gives me enough support for my >B cup size.

Fits as expected, with the size i ordered

i have never been A medium top size in my life. My tee shirt size is Ex-Small, and when I was a small, I was only a size 4. I  don't love all the colors. Plus, it's made for women with less of a breast gap ( which is most women) . However, do to the very stretchy material  I can make the cups space in between them wider fitting (buy stretching that area between them for atleast 90 seconds  to a couple mins buy pulling away from each other before putting it on each time).  The quality is VERY good and the rest of it fits perfectly. However, I ordered a medium and and am a 32C size.  Which is the smallest for that size range. I would think if your on the large end of a size range you should size up a size. And go to the Genie Bra size chart ( google it online) before ordering. To get the right size.  These bras are NOT for heavy sports bra use. But, with the removable cup inserts in, and the right size, It defiantly provides, light to moderate support even when exercising. For women without very large breasts. If you have very large breasts Im not sure if you should exercise in it. But, the right size should fit you for other non dressy occasions (obviously). They will keep you very cool and are very comfortable. There great for sleeping in. And terrible for low neck tees or blouses.

  These statements are made only keeping the inserts in the bra cups in. Taking them out will show your nipples and make alot of the above not true.

  The price is awesome for the quality of these.

I hope this helps.

I would assume that if you are smaller, they wouldn't be so thin and as your size goes up, they would thin out more, but they would still fit very well, thanks to the amount of stretch. Overall, I would say they were an excellent purchase for what I wanted them for - cool and comfortable for exercising and walking. reviewText: This hat has been great for the cold and snow. It's warm and soft and stayed on baby's head even while in the carrier. The magnetic closure is pretty secure (and you can stick the hat to your fridge so it doesn't get lost!) without choking baby if the hat is pulled. My baby has a rather large head and at 5 months, the 6-12 month size fits nicely with some room to grow into for a snug fit for next winter.

i am in love! was so excited to see that it was in my mailbox and couldn't wait to tear open the packaging. I love the quality and am very happy with it. seriously cannot wait for the tundra weather to be over to wear it! took approximately 2-2 1/2 weeks to get to me. SO HAPPY! :))

I would forsure order again from this seller!! :)

reviewText: Looks like the picture, and I'm happy with the quality. Great price!

Frankly I'm flabbergasted at the positive reviews here. The only thing that adequately explains it is they must be written by teenaged girls. If I were 12, hell, even 15, I would love this sh*t. As an adult with a permanent kid's brain, however, tempered by death and taxes, though this army shirt seems skully cool, it is pure communist labor camp crap. It arrived with a hole in one of the pockets, and when I unbuttoned it, one of the snaps flew off off it wholesale, leaving a torn gap in the front placket of the shirt. The skull appliqu is so precariously applied that, again, it's like a school-night crafts project one did in junior high. Also, it is not a jacket, not water-proof or resistant in *any* way (a quick spritz with a water bottle will prove this), and if you have truly passed puberty without dieting or having been an athlete, it does not fit around proper breasts, nor fall anywhere below your waistline (the picture is zehr deceptive).

Please let me suggest better skullwear. I purchased a coolio sarongy on Amazon [1 World Sarongs Womens Skull Swimsuit Cover-Up] in blue & white and I use it as a shoulder cover, scarf, hip adornment and skirt! And being rayon, it really is water-resistant.
summary: Surprised There Wasn't a Note From a Political Prisoner Attached!

Ordering from Allegra K is always hit or miss, but recently it has been a majority of misses. I am 5'5 and a size 2 so I ordered a small. The shirt fit fine around my mid section, but the top of the shirt was extremely tight with the sleeves barely fitting around my arms. The shirt is of cheap material, but does not look that bad from a distance. Upon opening the package I could smell the shirt. The scent of cheap dye and chemicals lingered as I tried on the item. I had to remind myself that the shirt was made in China and does not adhere to any US toxic substance standards and so I promptly threw the item in the wash before wearing it. This will likely be my final purchase from Allegra K as I would like to stop supporting cheap overseas labor on flimsy ill-fitting garments.

reviewText: I ordered this dress in the wine red, very nice color... a little more vibrant than my screen showed. I usual wear a large and this dress has tons of room everywhere but the arm holes. I don't have weirdly large arms or anything, like other reviewers said the arm holes are just really high. I will be working on adjusting them this week, which shouldn't be hard if you have basic sewing skills (the seam is really easy to get too). The neck on this dress has a tie but under that there are two buttons which can be difficult to get by yourself. This dress has a great satin lining, no issues with it being see thru. Also I'm 5'7" and I will have to wear a taller pair of heals for this dress not to hit the floor, which is what I was hoping for. Great dress for the price, would be hard to beat.

Overall, I like this dress. The red color is really pretty, the material is soft and flowy, and it even shipped faster than the predicted dates. I didn't give it 5 stars because the opening for the arms are really tight. They pinch my armpits and I don't even have big arms or shoulders. The dress is longer than I expected, too. I'm 5'6" and the dress drags a few inches around my feet barefoot. This isn't a huge issue since it just means I can wear it with heels.
summary: generally good but opening for arms are really small

reviewText: Okay....I returned the M size, it said it was for a size 10 (I wear a medium 8-and this was small.) I returned it, but I loved the fit so much, I ordered a L (supposedly at 12) I got it and it fits!! It fits so well, I ordered the their other colors. I am big chested, so its difficult for me to find shirts that fit good. Either you gotta buy them too big, to accommodate the bust size, and this only makes you look fat. I am 5'4', have a small waist (36DD bust), so I run into this a lot. So when you find a form fitting shirt, that no only accommodates the bust, but also accentuates your waist...girl, the look is amazing. I don't look fat, I look good. My figure doesn't look frumpy, it looks polished. So...I ordered the others...I pray to god, they fit. Cuz you know....sometimes, the makers get the sizes mixed up or something...so, once I get them, I will let you know. But yes, if you have a big bust, these run small, very small. Go larger.

reviewText: I used their size chart, and ordered a SIZE LARGE. (I typically wear size large).  The shirt that arrived and that I tried on seemed like a very loose fitting X-LARGE size.  The only way I'm going to be satisfied with keeping this shirt is if I sew in some elastic into the back waistline to make it more formfitting, and/or sew in some darts into the front and back.  Honestly, the shirt is without an hour-glass shape, but hangs straight down on the sides.  (I'd specifically chosen this shirt because the photo of it, at first glance, makes it look hour-glass and very fitted--so I'm quite disappointed regarding that.  Now that I look closer at the photo, it looks as though the model had to pinch the front and the back of the shirt to give  it an contouring.  The sleeves were pleated at the top, giving it a "slight" Victorian-poof look (that part I like).  But sadly the sleeves also hang half-way down the length of my hand, so I'm going to have to add two lengthwise strips of elastic to the outer side of EACH sleeve (above the buttons) to bring it to the 3/4" length that the model is showing. ---- I think this blouse will look CUTE ENOUGH AFTER I GET ALL THE SEWING ADJUSTMENTS DONE, after which it'll end up having vintage waist-contouring and sleeves by the time I'm done with it.
summary: The shirt that arrived and that I tried on seemed like a very loose fitting X-LARGE size

The med is about 29" long (Lg 30.75), just over 17" wide at the bottom band which stretches (Lg 19). My bust is almost 41", my hips 36". The batwing sleeves give extra room for large busts & allows me to go down a size. The medium fits me perfect & is so slimming. This is one of the few tops on the market which is made for top heavy women like me (natural DD). I just got to watch my belly fat in this. This is dressier than sweatshirts, not too thick or bulky, longer & still very comfortable. The fabric is good quality, not thin or see-through in any way unlike other brand's cheap tops here on amazon (like Leggings Queen or Clothes Effect). The navy blue does look good with jeggings or jeans. Update: I bought the pink in a large (not available in med for Prime) & added the stats. It is still slimming, but looser-fitting with extra room, great if you have a bit of a belly or like shirts slightly oversized. I now know why some say it looks like a sweatshirt. The pink is not a solid color like the navy, but is "heather", making it look more casual & weathered- still looks better than a sweatshirt or plain t-shirt. The neckline is way too wide, but I knew that from the picture. My lazy quick fix for many of my tops is to fold the fabric over on itself at the back of the neck & pin it with 2 safety pins, making the opening smaller so my bra straps do not show. My long hair covers that area. But the opening on this one is so big, I just might have to take it in on each side. I hate sewing but good quality, slimming tops made for people with smaller hips are hard to find. I do wish they made these in more colors (not heather) & that the neckline was smaller.  Sorry, I guess I am old school & do not believe that showing bra straps are sexy, only tacky & low class. My only other complaint is that not all colors & sizes are available with 2 day prime shipping. I have never been unsatisfied with the quality of Allegra K's tops. They all seem very well-made with good quality fabric. Never see-through or falling apart. Allegra K: thanks for the batwing tops! Please make more styles & colors, especially for this summer!
summary: PERFECT FOR LG BUST, SM HIPS!

I was also extremely disappointed to find that the stitching on the sleeves were horrible. FITS SMALL. I shouldn't wear it but it's so cute!  I'm an XL girl, it fits like a large

reviewText: Doesn't look like the one in the picture too short fits right but the length of the sweater is short.

nice  but a bit large , still can be worn, material is all right not thin not thick, nice with jeans.

reviewText: Really, really small. I'm going to just give it to my nine year old niece because it WILL fit her now and makes me look like I'm trying to wear my nieces clothes because it's so small. I believe I got a large.

reviewText: It is great for tights but the boat neck is more like a dolman top and I just kept pulling it up.  I may have gotten too large of a size.  I got lots of compliments on the look of the top.

reviewText: The material is very thin and soft. It is a comfortable wear. However it isn't as long as in the photo.

I love the fabric and how the material breathes, love the fit, love the style, love the pattern, love the tapered base (very forgiving for broad hips). Love the chic and fun yet professional style! love it, love it, love it!!! Great for covering up in warm climate. Love it so much that I ordered an identical one for my sister and a white with black dots for myself.

I would recommend this with confidence to any one. It is beautiful, more nicer cut  than expected for such an amazing price. The material was good. I have not washed them yet so I am not sure whether there will be much change.

reviewText: Very pretty, very nice but the size runs to small. The seller expects you to pay for exchange/returns. I would recommend this blouse but order up. Or your stuck with a blouse that doesn't fit.
I was very surprised! I'm 5'4", 150lbs, and D breast. It fit perfectly. I ordered a medium and can't wait to wear it to work. It's not shear so it's not necessary to wear a shirt under. Love it!

I always receive many compliments when I wear this to work.  I really love that you can just pull out of dryer and hang until ready to use...no ironing required.
only issue is that the neck is a nit snug and there is no extra in the opening....but once it's on it looks great.
This top is for what I purchase it for (work).  Is a perfect professional top.  I love it.  Its cool, comfortable and fits great.
fits great, cant believe the price, will hand wash just in case but great fit, I was worried about sizing but its a perfect 10
i like it but you guys could considered a little for the chubby girls.. just saying,but i really like it

More like a jrs large. I wear jrs size 9 bottoms and tops medium. In womens I wear a 6 but not like old navy size 6 or express size 6 or new york new york size 6 which then im more like a 4.  Target tops I wear small and pants i wear 4 low cut waist. American clothes are made different.  I think i should of just bought the small size. There are best for petite. Good deal!

as you can probably assume... i usually just wear this to bed now.

I was impressed with the weight of the material on this shirt. It was a little small and I did pick one size larger then what I normally wear so in the future I may order two sizes up.  But it seemed like good quality and I would order from them again.

I love this shirt and the seller is great about returns.  I will say that when I ordered what is usually my size, I took it out and held it up and it was huge!  It's supposed to be roomy, but this was...shall we say...very generous.  I sent that one back and reordered the next size down and I LOVE it!!  It's comfortable, roomy but not to excess and it looks great!!  Even my husband likes it.  I would recommend this shirt and the seller.

reviewText: May run large but it fitting me awesome! Looks great and it's a flattering color. The off center button decor is odd, but I've received compliment on it. I loved the hemmed sides, very chill look and comfy!
purchasing in the other color now.. love it, wear it all the time.  very comfortable

Is my size, fabric is really soft and comfortable, casual to use formal or informal, amazing design, totally recommendable, excellent quality and price is really good

reviewText:

Oh, not sure what's up with the complaints  about the neck, cuz my head had more than enough clearance when I put this top on.
Beautiful blouse. The material is so soft! I love it! This brand is really great. I have never had a blouse that felt so soft.

I ordered a Medium and it fits me like the photo (5'6" 130lb 36C). The fabric is light and airy, and the shirt itself is loose and comfortable. Mine shipped from Amazon so it only took a week. I liked it so much, I ordered the white version of this shirt.
I gave this blouse as a gift for my mother and she loved it. It has great texture and the size was correct. She said it looks like tailored made.
I bought a medium and ut fits perfect with s little room. ..The top does not drape like the photo but its beautiful. You could wear without an inside top its not too sheer..love it

Way too large and fit me wrong.  Gave it away to someone that it would fit.  Color was pretty and as shown.

THIS SHIRT DOESNOT HAVE ANY LEGNTH TO IT AT ALL I THOUGHT IT WAS ME BUT MY HUSBAND NOTICED IT AS WELL

reviewText: arrived exactly on time and fits quite nicely. i didn't have very high hopes but i could get it in 2 days via amazon prime and it was only $8 so i figured why not and bought it. very pleased :D though i will say its a bit brighter and pinker than expected.

it seems much more expensive than it is

It had a bit of a smell when taken out of the package but nothing a hand wash won't solve.

I wore it today to work and love it. It is a wrinkle free material and of a great quality. It also doesn't require a camisole under it. It's airy and so soft as well. A perfect combination. The size is wonderful (extremely comfortable, yet flattering). What a deal on the price as well! One of my favorite purchases!

Dissappointed!

i like it its beautiful and all but its smaller and not for those who are busty. doesnt fit like it does in the ppicture and the color came in creme not white but all in all a good buy.

Would not recommend and would not ship back at the price.
Nice shirt, but it is actually more of an 8/9. No where near an XL. I gave it to a skinny friend, she likes it.
I know my size. I like the top and I wear it often as a light sweater. Would reccommend to friends
Too short, came to my belly button? Awkward fitting. Material is nice though.. Soft. But too small.. I wish it would have fit.
Same color but the buttons are centered on the shirt and it's nowhere near as long as the shirt that's pictured.  I won't wear it......
The product shown is not what I received! The first thing is that it is shown as a longer over the hip type of shirt,  and actually it's a waistline shirt!
Great color. I wear the blouse to school as I wait for spring time. It is comfortable, stretchy and allows great expression.

This blouse came to me and was not at all as advertised. It looked like it was just made or garage sale item for a 7 year old. Not like the pic at all. Very disappointed.  I want my money back but shipping it back is too much hassle but I will not order clothes from Amazon anymore because of this. I wish a rep from Amazon would call me . I just might call Amazon myself speaking of that.
Its rather cute, but it kinda cuts too close to my neck and then it shows so much of my shoulder that it shows the bra, so I have to wear a strapless with it.
summary: Looks good, fits too close to neck and shows too much shoulder

reviewText: The shirt was shorter than it looked in the picture and the buttons were closer to the center of the shirt so it did not look like an intentional off set.
summary: It looked better on the computer

reviewText: I had gotten a blue one for christmas and loved it but...the reddish one fits differently and is smaller despite being the same size.  It's both short waisted and smaller in width than the blue one I have.
summary: I had gotten a blue one for christmas and loved it but...

reviewText: The chest measurements were correct (I'm an XL) but the arm measurements were certainly off.  I was amazed at how snug the arms felt.  The shirt length wasn't as shown.  It wears about  at belt line rather than a tunic line.  Changes the look altogether.  Would return it it wasn't such a hassle and the shipping would be about 1/3 the cost that I put out on the top, so decided to keep it and just complain.  Maybe save your money on this one.

The "XL" shirt was far too small and barely fit my sister who generally wears a small. Also the buttons were sewn on in the middle of the shirt, was missing one button not as shown and had a weird dart sewn in.

I bought this so that i could wear with leggings and a tunic style top.  Not the case. It was way smaller and shorter than the picture shows.  Of course all models are a size 0, so it always looks great.
The buttons were not at the side like it shows (which i loved) but down middle of to the side slightly. :Looks like a bad tailor job.  This is a long sleeve t-shirt ,,,not a tunic top.

This is an ugly shirt. The seams are uneven, the neck is too flash dancy, and the lower hem is not stretchy. The button detail is off as well. The color is not as pictured but flecked with white. I found this unusual since my previous purchases from allegra k have been great. Using this as a grease rag in the garage.

Ok where to start.....  The color is not as pictured but that could be the resolution on my computer (although I have never had this problem before).  The buttons were down the middle (not the side) Leaving a pleat down the belly area.  The neck was not as wide as pictured either.  All of these things I could have lived with.  The things that were problematic were the sizing and not as pictured at all!  I go for longer shirts because I have a very large chest that seams to make every shirt shorter that usual.  This one however is not even close to being as long as it shows.  When I put it on it comes just below my chest.  UMMMM sorry but I am not a teenager, and this is not the 90's where belly shirts were appealing.  Moms with stretch marks should not wear them and I'm not gonna start.  I ordered and XL, I think it was more like a Med for a short teen (to make it even closely look like the picture).  The positives however is the material is very soft.  I'm going to give it to one of my sons friends sisters.  It will look great on a 12-14 year old girl or petite woman.  Just not for me.
Shipment received as expected. Size a little smaller than normal. Still very cute style and if you wash it inside out it won't ball up.
This shirt is just okay.  It does nothing for you but looks okay with a scarf  or something.  I wouldn't have bought it if I tried it on in the store.

I tend to like my shirts a little longer. I am just shy of 5'4'' and the shirt will fall at my waist. I can stretch it down to try cover a little of my backside but it doesn't look right. It looks longer in the picture, falling just past the mannequin's hips. And there are wrinkles making you think there is extra fabric. I am not tall and I ordered a size Large.
It fits nothing like it does on the model, alot shorter than what is shown. Must be sized for juniors, sleeve are a very naroow fit.
This shirt is nice for the price. Soft comfy fabric and a nice pink color. Its a little shorter than shown, but otherwise it fits as expected.

This is NOT AT ALL what is pictured! What was shipped was half the length, barely reaching my waist!!!! Also on what was shown the buttons are off center and on what I got the buttons were nearly in the middle!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!! POOR ADVERTISING!!!! Sad seeing I got one of their long dress/shirts for xmas and I loved it.
It's ugly it's short not long, the buttons are in the middle of the shirt not on side,  the color is not the same at all it's more orange pink don't buy you will be disappointed.
This shirt fits perfectly, I really love how soft it is the only thing I had hoped for was that the buttons were a little more slanted as they currently make an up and down line.
The buttons are not as off centered as in the photo but everything else is the same as I thought it would be. Love the color.
it looks nice and fits loosely and comfy. the color is nice and the fabric has a slightly stretchy quality.

The fabric is very soft to touch.  However, looking at the picture, versus what came- two different tops.  The top that came to me is approximately half the lenght of the one pictured, there is not any extra room (and I ordered an XL) and it is cut exactly like a normal, run of the mill, crew neck, unisex sweatshirt.  To give you an idea, my 12 year old neice, who wears youth size 12-14 wears it, and it still doesn't fit the way it looks in the picture.  This item is not cut from the same pattern as the picture.  Absolutely a different product than what is represented by the photo.
summary: Not at all how it appears

reviewText: What a comfortable, flattering top and such a nice color! I wear a size 12 and ordered a Large. Would recommend this to friends and family.

Love this shirt wear it all the time ... only thing is its big on my shoulders so I'm cold after sitting down but so comfy .. I ordered a blue one because I LOVE this how it feels if ur tiny small is the size to go im only 4'9 and I wear small to medium on things  .. every brand is different so go by there guide will save the hassle of getting the wrong size

I love this shirt! But the model must be 5ft and 100lbs because I ordered a size up from what i usually wear and it fits as though it is a small. I am not a small girl and I have a bigger chest, so i would not recommend this to anyone or the brand! (unless you are very petite, then it is a great buy)

The shirt I just received looks nothing like the one shown!  The one received is not  long at all, actually hits high on the waist!  The buttons are in the center front, not offset to the left. And the sleeves are not as long.  Very disappointed.
summary: Not the same shirt as shown in the picture!

reviewText: I was afraid of getting a shirt too small.  normally i am a medium in US shirts.  I ordered a large.  not frumpy, not tight fitting.  this is a loose fitting shirt. not tight around my mid section like the model picture.  it is very flattering on me for my shape.  if you are a medium and want a more fitted look to this loose shirt, like the model, then buy medium.  If I didn't have a bit of a belly, a medium would've looked hot, more fitted around the waist.  mine on me looks like a comfy loose shirt.  I love this shirt.  so size is accurate.

I purchased the shirt to wear to work or casually out on the town! What I received was an ugly sweatshirt! Waste of time and money! Will never by from seller ever again! Tried to upload a pic but system won't allow me to!
They missed sewing a seam under the right arm.  Also, definitely made for skinny women.  I'm not huge, but the arms fit weird on me.  Going to return

I decided to order the same size as I did I n a previous Allegra blouse XL and this is more like a Medium. Fits and looks nothing like it does on the model. The material also looks nothing like what's advertised in the picture. Looks more like a sweater and hits right at my waist. I'm 5'8 with a bust size of 40C waste of money. Order something else trust me. Will give to Goodwill.

I usually wear an xsmal/small in American brands, but knowing this is a brand from Hong Kong, I figured I'd need a medium for it to fit like the picture... Nope! I coulda gotten a small and been fine. I kept the medium anyway, because I like the extra baggy fit for this, but if you don't, go ahead and order your usual size for this shirt. It's really comfy and warm, used a thicker fabric than I expected. Pleasant surprise! I really like this sweatshirt!

I thought it would be a lot longer than it is and I am 5'2'' so I am a little disappointed. Also the tag was really bothering me to the point I ripped it out b/c I had no scissors and that was a bad idea overall and now I have 2 holes :( this is my fault but it doesn't change the fact that the fabric is thin, but it was cheap and to be expected. I just keep looking at the picture they display and there is no way that this shirt is as long as what they are portraying it to be. Other than that, the color is exactly what I wanted and expected and I like the sleeves. Also the fact that it is roomy. :)
Said that it would fit losely but it fits like a normal t-shrit but it is really comfortable. I am buying more I liked it so much.

This shirt came very large. I ordered a small, and the label says small but its huge! Maybe its meant to be baggy. Its cute, but its lighter than whats in the picture, and it seems to fit me all wrong. Plus there are buttons going down the front and I didn't see that at all in the picture. It kind of looks like its a different shirt when you get it. I'll wear it, its cute, but if I saw it in a department store I probably would've passed.
This is my new favorite shirt! It is so comfortable and the price is awesome! I will be ordering again from them!

Im 5'2", 135 lbs, 36C....got an XL....fits nice with yoga pants or jeans....even leggings because I am short it does cover my rear or looks cute with the banded band at my waist too.  I hate stuff that clings to my mid section and this is just loose enough to not look frumpy and it is super comfy!  Can be work on or off shoulder and it has good chest coverage.  I screwed up and put it in the dryer-which I NEVER do with Allegra tops (I own many) but even though I did this it didn't shrink on low heat....bonus!  I want it in black...its annoying this top doesn't come in black when it seems 98% of their stuff does. I gave it 4 stars because although it is soft and didn't shrink like a shriveled up raisin after the dryer I think the color description is bogus. It should be called rose not fuchsia....
summary: Its hardly fuchsia more dusty rosish-reddish (if this is a color-lol) Fits nice, good quality for this brand

reviewText: This is a cute top. The material is nice and soft, not too thin. If you want it to fit like the picture of the model, you should order one size up. I bought a Medium. I usually wear size 4. The top fit, but was not loose like on the model. Also, the hem did not reach the length that it shows in the picture. I think a Large would have been better.

I love this top. The color is just what I wanted. And the fit is perfect. I actually like that the buttons are asymmetrical. I highly recommend this top. It's a really great value for the price. And as always the fast delivery time is a bonus.
this is the first article of clothing I have ever purchased on Amazon and it fit perfect.  Love the color.
The material is super soft and the color is pretty well matched with the picture. It's a great comfy top, just wish it was a little longer.
Nice shirt, and material was good too. If you want to look similar like the photo, get a size up.
This is nothing at all like the photo.  Took months to arrive and looks weird.  Not a tunic by any stretch of the imagination, and I don't think its even a good looking top to wear with jeans.
summary: Nothing at all like the picture

reviewText: Huge misrepresentation top was horribly made I gave it to my kid which by the way fitted her perfect :(
this shirt is much shorter than in the picture. same color and buttons. definitley not what i was wanting but the material is soft and thats a plus

I'm 5'1 and 150 lbs the large size fits me really well.  The fabric is really nicely made; soft and heavy.  Colors are true to picture.  Nothing clings to me in an annoying or unattractive manner. Buttons are nice and lay the way they do in the pic.

I got this shirt today, I'm 5'10" 145 pounds the shirt fits but it doesn't look like the picture.  It's not near as long as the picture shows it stops right at my waist. And the buttons are not over to the side like the pic they are down the middle.  I will keep the shirt just know that mine is nothing like the description.
Fit just right very comfortable! Very soft material the color wad a little lighter than pictured but still loved it.

I would like to know why anyone would PAY for shipping when I could have made the cloth, learned to properly sew it, dyed it and wear it before it comes in the mail....

Took OVER a month for it to be delivered, I will not purchase another item from this company.

I ordered this shirt because I thought it would be long enough to wear with leggings, based on the picture in the ad.  However, when the shirt came in, it is too short to wear with anything but jeans, and it's barely long enough for that.  The picture shows that the shirt is long enough to come down to the upper thigh, or just below the buttocks, BUT in reality, the shirt barely comes down to the higher part of the waist.  Also, the shirt is not cut the same way in the sleeves or the neck, as it appears in the ad.  The sleeves are too short and too tight, not baggy and long as they appear in the ad, and the button on the collar are centered, giving the shirt the look of a henley top.  I'm very disappointed in the shirt.  I will not buy again from this seller, nor will I ever buy this brand again.  False advertisement at it's worst.
summary: Picture in ad does not match the actual look of the shirt

reviewText: I really like the color. It gives a nice glow to my skin tone. The fit is a little bigger than what I expected. Great to wear over a tank or chamie with jeans and boots.
The material is very nice, and the color is lovely.  The only thing that is not quite right is my shape, and that is not the top's fault.
Nice and loose and fabric feels soft and warm.  Fits large busted women well and the Large is great! Thanks!
It fits very well and I love the color. Will definitely look to purchase more articles of clothing by this brand.

I ordered this to wear with leggings and didn't realize that the green lower section isn't part of the shirt!  (It must be a skirt the model is wearing.)  So, while the shirt is comfy and a nice fit, it's too short to wear alone with leggings.
It fits perfect and it is warmer than I expected! I low this shirt. I will most likely order more Colors!

This is a cute stylish shirt. I am 5'4 130 lb. I ordered a small and It fits just fine. The sleeves come right to my writs so if you like your sleeves long don't get it.  The band at the bottom fits great. It came way faster then it said it would. I ordered the pink color  and its true to the pic. Overall I am pretty happy with this shirt.
I was so disappointed to see that the product I receives was completely different than the photo... I returned! I was kinda looking forward to this one... :(

The model show says she's a little taller then I am and I thought well great! I was looking for a long top. In the picture it's pretty much to past her crotch. It didn't even go to my waistline unless I pulled it down and it never stayed that way. I'm a size 8 to 10 and ordered large to have a little more room and it was really  snug. Plus no mater how I styled it  the buttons to the side just never worked. The arms are tighter then the picture shows. Awful.

One -- it is not a tunic.  Falls just to my waist.  Two -- buttons are just about 1/4 inch off from center ... just enough to make it look like a mistake but not to the side like it was supposed to be.  Three -- not bat-winged as described.  This shirt is a piece of crap but it will cost me more to return it to freaking China than it's worth.  Going in the trash!  Seriously disappointed.
I love this shirt I am actually wearing it as I type this and have received many compliments on it. I am 5'6" and weigh 105 I got an xsmall and it is a perfect fit!

The top I received is not like the picture! As pictured, I expected flouncy sleeves, the overall length to hit at the hips AND that the buttons would be offset from center. Not true at all! This is not a long top by any means, it comes down right at the waist as any regular top does (I'm 5'2"). The sleeves are just regular long sleeves like on a light-weight sweatshirt. The neck line is not a boat neck but just a standard scoop. MOST disappointing to me is the buttons are smack dab in the center and not off to one side at all. The color is accurate and that's the most positive I can be about this top.

This is more like a children's size, not an adult size.  The portion is VERY short, the buttons and style of the shirt are not as pictured, the sizing is WAY off.  The shirt barely came past my rib cage, yet looks like a tunic in the picture.  The quality seems as expected for price, but I at least expected it to be as pictured and also fit.  Very disappointed, probably cost me more to return it, so I guess I'm out the money.
summary: Not even close to picture, style OR fit

reviewText: Overall this is a very nice sweater. My only complaint is that it's not as long as the picture shows. Fits well everywhere except it hits at the waist.
I love love love this top! It' soo cute, fashionable and soft. Perfect with skinny jeans and boots. I needbmore colors
summary: Its what every closet should have!

reviewText: It looks just like the picture.  It is very comfortable and can be dressed up for work or you could wear with sweatpants at home.
I like this sweater, but I don't love it. It fits me kinda funny. I am 5"7 and its....ok. I prob wouldn't buy another one
This shirt is more like a gym sweater. It looks nothing like the picture. The color is even different! Why advertise something falsely?? very disappointed!

The item is much smaller than the picture portrays.  The item fit like a regular shirt.  It was attractive enough, so we kept it, but it fits nothing like the model.  The arms are not loose, there isn't any extra fabric for rouging at the bottom.  Suggestion, get a size or two larger.
This shirt looks nothing like the picture....Must have an xl on a size 0 model....Looks like an old lady shirt with wide band waist ribbing....Ugly
I ordered this in large in hopes of being able to wear with leggings and boots. Nope, one washing shrunk it too short and the shoulder area still slide off my shoulder.

For the price I paid I didn't expect a great quality top but I was surprised when I got it.  I loved it!  I ordered a Large and I'm Usually a 10/12 and it was perfect!  The Material wasn't cheap at all!  I'm actually going back online to buy other colors.  It also arrived very quickly.  THANK YOU loved my purchase!

I didn't read any reviews before purchasing this item and wish I had.  It took about 3 weeks to get with standard shipping.  The two seams along the arms feel weird and a little bothersome, although not terrible but the fit isn't anything like shown on the picture.  I typically wear a 10-12. I bought a Large, which was recommened for size 12 and the shirt barely comes to my hips.  It doesn't drap down over my thighs like the picture shows and it's a little more snug than I'd like.  As for the material, it is somewhat like a sweatshirt; but you can't really tell unless you touch it.  It does look nice and the color is pretty, I just think the way it's put together is cheap.  The buttons don't align to the side like the pictures shows either, it's almost in the middle but off just a tad and instead of looking cute, it looks like it was sown impropperly.  I wouldn't buy another one.

I was going to give this as a gift but didn't like the quality.  I would have sent it back but didn't have a printer to print out a label nor did I want to pay for the return.  I should have known it wasn't good quality considering the price.

This shirt is soft and comfortable to wear.  It does not hang as low on the body as the picture suggests and the shoulders lay more off the shoulders on me.  I have pretty broad shoulders so this surprised me.  Very slow shipping but they warned of that ahead of time.  I ordered 2 different shirts from the same company at the same time and this one came in more then a week later.
Looks great but size is a bit deceiving. The model for this product is not your average model. Please use normal size models.
summary: Great look but pay attention to size

reviewText: This company runs a little large.  This particular item is more of a sweatshirt, however that's really in style right now.  I just throw a tank underneath and it looks cute!

I purchased this item a size smaller than I normally would because of the feedback from previous buyers stating that the item runs too large.  The fit was good except that the items length is not as pictured as the bottom of the garmet falls at the waist not below as it should have. I guess for the price I really can't complain too much, I will just be more weary in the future when purchasing Allegra K garmets.

I was a bit disappointed when I got this shirt. It doesn't look much like the picture. It looks like a sweatshirt with three random buttons on the chest. The sleeves are not long enough to cover my arms, so I have to push it up to 3/4 sleeves or it looks really awkward.
Looks like the photo, runs a little larger then actual size which I wish I had known and is my only complaint, very comfortable, looks great with my favorite pair of leggings and boots!
This Fits great!! I love it!! Are there more colors? If so what colors are they? In the same size!!!!!

I was really looking forward to receiving this shirt because the picture is so cute and there were a lot of good reviews. I can't wear this shirt at all. It is much shorter than pictured (I am 5 foot 4 inches with a short torso). It is so short that it barely goes to my waist. If I lifted my arms, my stomach would definitely show. The shirt is also really wide in the torso and smaller in the forearms. The color is exactly the same. The fabric seems comfortable. I am sad that it does not look like the picture.

So I ordered a large and it's the right size for me - 5' 7" and 150 lbs.  However I would have wanted it a little more loose as shown on the model, so I would say a XL would be better.  Still the large fits well.  The cotton is the right weight, not to thin and not to heavy.  This with leggings is the perfect weekend lounge outfit!
I love this shirt! It's soft (very soft) and fits exactly as shown in the picture.  It drapes very elegantly.  I wish I could buy more of these in different colors.
I like it, it is a nice sweater like shirt. It doesn't look as flowy on as it does in the photo but I like it anyway!

First of all, the shirt isn't even the same one that is shown in the picture. The sleeves are way too short, the color is wrong and it took all but 10 minutes for the strings to come apart and a hole to appear. I'm really disappointed. I waited about a month to get this shirt and it wasn't worth it at all. I would return it but the company wants nothing to do with returns.
This top is made of very comfortable fabric! I like the fit, although it is not as expected. It is not as long as it appears in the photo,  or is it as shapely.
This shirt was somewhat boxier than it looks on the model, a little shorter and wider, not really the long, slim look.  It is still very comfortable as it is made out of a sweatshirt material.
Like others have said this is a sweatshirt material really. It's comfy though, but nothing special. Doesn't fit long like the pic, more like a regular sweatshirt would fit.

It's a cute top.  I've gotten several compliments on it.  It's not the best material but it's cheap and you get what you pay for. FYI the green at the bottom is NOT part of the shirt.  I am 5'6 and size 8-10.  I ordered a large, it's a little big but I like it.
Love it. Could've went down a size but since it's allegra k and they do the Asian size I was skeptical.
This became my favorite shirt the moment I put it on
Fringe comes off easy
I LOVE  THIS shirt , its amazing !  it fits me well , and i  like how looks the open back
It looks just like the picture and it fits perfect! Can't complain!!!!  And the delivery was in a timely manner.

This shirt isn't the BEST shirt I have ever bought, but for the price I think it's outstanding. It fits as expected, I got a medium and I am 140lbs 5'2". Shipping was a couple or few weeks, but it's free. I think it's worth it. It's good to wear over leggings with boots.
This is now one of my favorite tops. I love the color (goes great with jeans) and it's soft and cozy despite being lightweight. Great for weather than requires long sleeves but nothing too heavy.
When I tried this on it was way too big and did not fit well at all. Also, the buttons did not even go down the middle. They were completely off to the side
I love this shirt it is casual with just a hint of dress. looks good with jeans. very happy with this purchase

This shirt is exactly as pictured but i usually buy smalls in my tops and this one was too small. I sent it back and ordered the medium so i will be back to re review it when it arrives. I am a Small/Medium in tops and about 1 or 2 regular, in jeans. The small didn't drape down the waist as pictured. if u want a small i suggest you buy a medium to get the comfy slouch look (as pictured)
summary: LIke the shirt. Sizes slightly off

reviewText: I bought this top because I wanted something to wear with my leggings.  I get compliments on it and I love it.  I would recomment it to anyone.  Thank you.
Returned this unflattering fitting top. It is huge in the smallest size. It is nothing like the picture. It depends on your expectations.
Great style. Great fit. There's no reason not to love it! I'll definitely be buying more clothes from this company!
Not as what I expected. The style was nice in the picture but not the actual clothing. I feel like I waisted my money. So sorry but true.
Beautiful piece and super soft!!!! It is perfect and versatile the arm length is good and the torso as well ( I am 6 feet tall and 145lbs). I would buy every color
I absolutely loved it, True to size and fits great. The material is very soft and has a nice yet casual appearance.
Fits just like it is supposed to, I ordered a small and it fits great, I will definitely keep ordering clothes from Allegra K, they are made well and you get it at a great price!
Cute shirt and made of nice material, but it fits a little snug.  I am definitely ordering a bigger size and giving this one away as a gift.
Such a great color! I love this shirt!  When ever I order from allegra k I know that no matter what it is im gunna love it. So nice

The product was nothing like the picture! Poor quality material, too thin. Didn't fit. Buttons on blouse, picture did not show buttons. Very poorly made not the length it shows on the picture. I would not recommend this to anyone!
I ordered a small and the top still fits too big. Its too thick of a material. I have tried it on twice, but have never actually worn it.
The ship time was good and the top fits nice and it is so soft I really like this top and I recommend this to anyone.

This shirt is made of a soft sweatshirt material.  I really like it because it is stylish and doesn't look too casual.  The neck opening is larger that what I normally would get, so I wear a tank top under it.  I still like it.
This sweater is super cute and fits really nicely. I am 5'2'' and 120. Also, the material is very soft.
it does not look this cute in person... different color it does not look like the one pictured! I don't recommend
summary: does not look like this in person!

reviewText: I thought this was going to be more like a tunic. It's more like a thin, slouchy sweatshirt. It's incredibly comfy and I'm going to keep it, but it's not at all what I expected.
summary: Cute and comfy, but not at all what I expected.

reviewText: Super comfortable sweater. I was a little worried about how the line would hug my hips since I am burdened with the family trait of big hips. But I absolutely love this sweater.
Fits as expected, and the picture is accurate. Buttons are good so far, and they are just decor (an easy fix if necessary). Shrinks a little after washing, not much. Might order an XL
Does not hold it shape very well even though I always hand washed it. It stretched so much I had to donate it.
summary: Does not hold it shape very well...

reviewText: It's really comfy and perfect for my casual office.  Though it doesn't quite sit on my the way it does in the picture, it's still nice. Thanks!!
This is a very comfortable top. The material is very soft. Great top to lounge around with. Sweatshirt look to it.

This shirt is extremely comfortable and soft; however, I ordered a small (I am normally a 4-6 on top), and the tag says small, but it fits like a large. I was hoping to be able to wear it more often, but because it is so baggy, I mostly just wear it for comfort around the house.

I just received this and love how soft it is! I am 5'6" and 160lbs and ordered a large and it fits wonderfully! I have a long torso and was worried about it being too short, but its perfect! Looks great with leggings and boots. Just what I wanted!

It's cute and light, but shorter than I expected.  Still a nice piece
all in all especially for the price!

I wish I could say this was a great product and it's as it appears in the pic, but it's not. The buttons are placed awkwardly on the side and the sweater is not the style as it shows. The fabric seemed nice and I would have kept it if those buttons didn't bug.
summary: Love the picture, not the product that was mailed.

reviewText: Very comfortable, fits as sized... so nice to wear with leggings and boots for the perfect, warm fall outfit. Very happy with this purchase.

My favorite shirt I own now. Fits exactly as the picture shows and the color matches exactly. Very soft fabric and is super comfortable and warm, but not to warm. Good for casual and work environments.

In Love with this shirt, if you don't have it, you are missing out!
This product is beautiful once it arrives however the first washing material gets balled up all over the place and I had to make this a nightshirt now

Nice fit, nice color, nice fabric, cute buttons, stitching on this is also well done. This is worth the purchase, and the shade of pink is really nice, too! It's very similar to the picture,maybe not as long as in the pic but it's def still nice!

Well this shirt is really cute and comfortable but it isn't exactly like the picture. The buttons are pink and the angle of the off center buttons is not the same. Overall it is a cute shirt and I like it.
Looks cheap - will be wearing it around the house with jeans.  Knit is thin and quality was a disappointment .

I usually wear between a 12 and 14, and this XL fits me well; not to big that it looks sloppy, and not to tight and revealing of my midsection. It is longer than most shirts which is nice with leggings, but it isn't dress length. I am a mid thirty mother of several and not super trendy, but this is nice to have so I'm not showing up in jeans and a t-shirt all the time. Easy to accessorize with since it is pretty plain, too. I like it, and it makes me want to try more Allegra K clothing! UPDATE: This is still a great shirt two months later, but don't bother trying the Women Round Neck Mesh Decor Sleeve Autumn Loose Shirt, definitely not the same cut OR fabric.

reviewText: I usually wear a medium in US size, so I go for Larges in Allegra K, some times they are too small and some times they are too big...

reviewText:
I absolutely LOVE the shape of the sunglasses and the polarization as other reviewers have stated.
Ladies with wider heads, beware: these are on the medium-narrow side. I don't believe I am particularly large headed, but the temples feel narrow and after a while hurt my head, so I need to remove them every so often to give my head a rest. That knocks off one star.
The second star is really worth two more: I have owned these glasses three weeks, and use them mostly for driving. I've stored them in my car's sunglass compartment when I am not driving. Not sure if it's heat related or what the reason might be, but a few days ago, I noticed there were blemishes on the the material of the temples. I thought the frame was melting or something. Well, turns out there is a film coating the resin frame, lending the glasses their really cool color. Somehow, for some unknown reason, the coating on my frames bubbled up and started peeling off. Now, I don't mind this so much, because these are not my particularly valuable accessories. But I am surprised it happened. I've owned (and sadly lost) other cheaper sunglasses without running into this issue.  If you are looking for a very nice looking, very cheaply made pair of Jackie O's, and you don't mind spending $25 on a cheap pair, this could be right for you. Otherwise, I advise you skip this one.

The glasses are beautiful to look at and they wear well and they block the sun at a decent leve.  However, they peel and scratch so badly.  I just got a replacement pair and they are already chipping.

reviewText:
My son purchased this hat because he's a Pokemon fan, and well... Umbreon is cool.

WHAT YOU MIGHT WANT TO KNOW
 This hat is surprisingly well made given the price.
 It is actually lined.  The interior has a black fabric inside that was hastily sewn. Ours came with a spot where the stitching wasn't complete, and a place where the seem was caught up in the stitching, but overall these flaws don't effect the wearability.

 The outside fabric is a thick black velour.
 The eyes are red with black pupils and a white dot of 'eye shine'.  I would say that they are prefabricated and sewn onto the velour.  Ours was extremely well sewn.  Very nice work.
 The yellow 'O' between the eyes is similarly sewn on, although the fabric is ever-so-slightly fuzzy.
 The only other adornment are the yellow stripes on the ears.  These are fuzzy and are made of additional fabric.
 The ears tend to flop backwards. You can send them forwards with a tilt of the head. If you want them to stand up you are going to have to add some structure.

 There are no cleaning instructions or fabric content labels on the hat.  Perhaps there was in the plastic bag. My son opened the package so there's no telling where any documentation went to.

 IMPORTANT to know is that this hat is HUGE. I have a large head and there was room to spare.  Not much, but it dropped down all the way over my head.
 There is no scent.

SUMMARY
Overall this is very good hat for $7 bucks. Ours had a couple of minor errors in the stitching of the lining, but that could be a fluke. It certainly didn't effect my ability to wear the hat. Which I did for Halloween.

The outside of the hat is very well done.  The main downside of this hat for most people is that it is adult sized.

If you are going to give this as a gift I suggest you get some colorful tissue paper and a gift bag/box, because it comes in a plain plastic bag.

Cute!

This is a larger hat even for an adult male above average height which suits me fine but be warned you may have some room. If you're a female or a male with a ponytail or other hairstyle that may aid in holding the hat via tucking your hair into it, I'd recommend it.
Love it
Good quality!

I was expecting a lot less from such a cheap price, however, it was exactly as advertised.

No complaints.  Good price and plenty big enough for my 20 year old male head.

reviewText: All you need to stretch your ears, great find!
Great quality! Evrtyhting came nice and packed with each size taper and pkuvs having their own little baggy. Haven't had any problems at all with these.

I wanted to wait until I had used the majority of these tapers and tunnels to review.

It is really difficult to get a set of this quality at this price. But there are definitely some flaws:

1. The gasket ring is a little too deep for my tastes. I had a lobe swell up (allergies + a recent stretch), and the swelling pulled the flare into my ear instead of popping off the gasket. This can also cause issues with the fistula getting snagged while inserting the tunnels just after stretching. Given that wearing tapers is unhealthy for your lobes, and pushing these tunnels through immediately after stretching can be difficult, there is an obvious problem.

2. The tunnels are a hair short. Healthy, thick lobes don't have a lot of room - Especially if they swell.

3. On the smaller sizes, the flare is not big enough, and is sloped in a way that can easily stretch your lobe if there is pressure. It shouldn't be a gradual slope, it should be pretty immediate (closer to a 90 degree flare, rather than a perfect curve).

4. The gaskets are not sized for the jewelry. A couple sizes seem to share the same gaskets, so some are tight, hard to put on, and others are loose. Not a big deal, but aggravating when you lose gaskets, or have difficulties putting them on.

5. As the taper size increases, so does the angle of the taper. At 8mm, the angle was too sharp for my tastes. I could feel the taper pushing the fistula out towards the back of my lobe rather than slowly sliding it open. This is not OK at all. I could easily see this causing a blowout. There is no reason for the tapers to have different angles. These tapers are already pretty short, and they stay the same length. But it is totally possible to ball the end instead of point it, and keep a constant angle and length. Theoretically, the taper could start at the previous thickness and end at the new thickness, rather than starting at a point and ending at the new thickness.

6. It is mimicking the gauge system, where 2ga to 0ga and 0ga to 00ga are both closer to 2mm than 1mm stretches. This takes it a step further and goes from 6mm to 8mm to 10mm. This might work for a few people, but you should really just get the in between sizes. Luckily, I found pretty cheap 1ga (~7mm) and 9mm sets. They also came with longer tapers that didn't have as steep as an angle. Bonus.

Given all these issues, I can't possibly give it more than 3 stars. It would be 2 stars if it weren't for the price - There are still a few usable pieces.
summary: Seems great at first, but there are some issues.

reviewText:
A group of guys, all age 40, discussed where they should meetfor lunch. Finally it was agreed that they would meet at Hooters, because thewaitresses had big breasts and wore short shorts.

Ten years later, at age 50, the friends once again discussedwhere they should meet for lunch. Finally it was agreed that they would meet atHooters, because the waitresses were attractive. The food and service were goodand the beer selection was excellent.

Ten years later, at age 60, the friends again discussed wherethey should meet for lunch. Finally it was agreed that they would meet atHooters, because there was plenty of parking, they could dine in peace andquiet with no loud music, and it was good value for the money.

Ten years later, at age 70, the friends discussed where theyshould meet for lunch. Finally it was agreed that they would meet at Hooters,because the restaurant was wheelchair accessible and had a toilet for thedisabled.

Ten years later, at age 80, the friends discussed where theyshould meet for lunch. Finally it was agreed that they would meet at Hooters,because they had never been there before
summary: The food and service were goodand the beer selection was excellent. Ten years later

reviewText:
This is basically how these coats fit:

The small fits like an x-small
The medium fits like a small
The M/L fits like a medium.

I ordered the black coat in medium, and it fits exactly like a small, which is no problem for me because that is my exact size, but I usually buy things in medium because I don't like buying my exact size. If I had known earlier how these sizes work, I would have bought an M/L. There weren't much reviews here when I ordered it, but anyways it's ok.

The next thing is that you have to be skinny/slim to fit into these sizes. If your shoulders are broad or your arms are chunky, then it will not fit you. I am 105 pounds and my are really slim, so it fits fine. If you are a skinny girl, just remember that each size is smaller than what it is. Order accordingly.

Now, a few other details about this is coat. Yes, it does have a few strings hanging and the buttons are a little weak, but the material is really nice and the coat overall is built really well. It's warm but it's more suitable for fall, not winter. It looks really nice on me and I love it a lot.
summary: Coat is for skinny, and I mean SKINNY women only

I purchased this product to use as a face cover for jogging with the dog. I purchased these when weather was cooler but not freezing and the thin material and stretchy fit was perfect for warming the air enough to prevent my chest and nose from hurting from the cold weather. It was not as stifling as the heavier ski-mask style athletic face covers and was very breathable. It has since frozen over and I still like to wear this product under the heavier face masks because it allows the face mask to slide/adjust easier on my face, and when I take the heavier mask off for a breather, it is nice to still have cover. I am very sensitive to things being tight around my jaw/face/head and am prone to migraines from pressure of even simple things like sun glasses, but this material is stretchy and light enough that it's not constricting at all.

The color of the print is very vibrant, a nice break from the standard blacks that face/head covers usually come in. It's a very soft and stretchy. I could see how the multifunction use could benefit on when on hiking: head cover, neck warmer, face cover, headband, etc. Very great price for a fun product, I will definitely buy again.

In the summer I tend to wear the half Buffs and well there is a lot of material with these so I just cut them in half. They didn't unravel and I have twice as many now. I love that they are so thin too that I can still throw a trucker hat over them and use it as a sweat band or to keep my ears warm.
summary: Serves its purpose for a great price

reviewText: Great value very useful product

These are the best purchase I've made for my running regimen in a long time. My ears get cold easily, so on slightly cool days (50's-60's) I can roll this up and make a headband/earwarmer. On a really cold day, like today (19degrees), I wore earmuffs and folded this in half to make a scarf/face-cover. Just pulled it up over my nose when I needed to and I stayed warm. I imagine I'll find more ways to use these as time goes on. I think they'll be useful for hiking in Moab later this month (November) too. Just enough extra warmth in chilly conditions. I might even use them as an extra layer for snowboarding!

Very useful and color stays after many washes but don't like some of the designs and the quality of fabric could be much better. I wish the designs were less varied. For use around the house they're perfect. I also use then as a light face mask that I can easily pull up and down for snowboarding and road cycling on icy days. Love it for that.
summary: Fabric could be better but overall very Useful

I love these! I pull them on my head, tie the end and wear with a visor when I run. These are so soft. Arrived quickly and are as pictured. They are so versatile and are going to be great going into fall and ideal in the winter.

reviewText:
Bought (Set 3) to keep the hair off my face when I cleanse and give myself a facial.  A bit tight for my head (thick hair, low hairline).

My dog was curious as to what I was playing with and I put one around her neck...she looks gorgeous in the purple Hawaiian print one.  She's a mostly black German Shepherd Dog about 65 pounds soaked and wet...about 20 inch neck.  Fits perfectly.  Just loose enough yet won't fall off. Took off her collar and she just may only wear these from here on.  I'm sure she's much more comfortable in this vs a hard collar.

Had an original Buff and it fit too snuggly on my head as well.  This is pretty close to it.  No seams, no hems...just fabric that won't unravel or bother you. Light-weight and stretchy in one direction only...the width of it.
summary: Looks Better on My Dog Than on Me...

reviewText: Great buffs for fishing plus the price that won't break bank. I will buy more when I need them. Those who are considering purchasing this item I would recommend you buy these they are great best part is the price :)

I am so happy to have found these. I work in a greenhouse and have shoulder length hair. Putting my hair up into a pony tail all the time was causing it to break. With these, I can wear a number of ways to protect and keep my hair out of my way while working.

While the material is a bit thinner than Buffs,  I am very happy with these!  The colors are great!  I got 6 of them for less than the price of one Buff!!!  I wear them to yoga and under a helmet when I ride.  I haven't washed them many times yet so I can't comment on durability.  So far so good.  I will buy another set!
bought this set for my sister! this is the real stuff! awesome material that feels great! ive seen this in the store for 25$ individually!
This is the greatest thing sense sliced bread.....LOL they work for so many things and so easy to use.  Great for doo rags under a helmet.

reviewText: IF you have the time and motivation you could definitely make these yourself and do a better job but for the price and convenience these are totally worth it. The ends are unfinished but that allows them to stretch more so not a problem for me. I plan on cutting a couple in half since as is they're too long for a wide headband. Overall I'm pleased.
Great products!  Love them, they fit wonderfully and they are so comfy.  Funky, cool and getting lots of compliments!  Yay!
